title: When is Oceanic Open Ladder Officially Starting?
body: Just wondering when we are going to be starting OOL. Teams have all started preparing and are still kinda wondering when it officially be announced and whether it will be around the same time as last year?

replies.body: Hi mate, I just released the information about it yesterday! You'll find it on the Esports boards. Sorry for the delayed release, I won't waste your time with excuses, I was slow to publish.
